data.name: Lyceum of the Strange
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

"Lyceum of the Strange" is a new series of short horror stories, more episodes coming soon. A collection of short animated tales depicting gloom and thrill. This series is influenced by the brilliant masters of horror such as Edgar Allan Poe , H.P Lovecraft and Hitchcock. Each episode will range from 3 to 15 minutes. The visual style use’s hand drawn ( water color aesthetic ) 2d character art over layed on 3d backgrounds. Created by Erik Matson Narrative voice over by Matt Amy Music by Mary Barron Additional art by Zombie_Grungehead Copyright 2018 Produced by Waves and Blaze
data.about_the_game:
"Lyceum of the Strange" is a new series of short horror stories, more episodes coming soon.
A collection of short animated tales depicting gloom and thrill. This series is influenced by the brilliant masters of horror such as Edgar Allan Poe , H.P Lovecraft and Hitchcock.
Each episode will range from 3 to 15 minutes.
The visual style use’s hand drawn ( water color aesthetic ) 2d character art over layed on 3d backgrounds.

Created by Erik Matson
Narrative voice over by Matt Amy
Music by Mary Barron
Additional art by Zombie_Grungehead
Copyright 2018 Produced by Waves and Blaze
data.short_description: "Lyceum of the Strange" is a new series of short horror stories, more episodes coming soon. A collection of short animated tales depicting gloom and thrill. This series is influenced by the brilliant masters of horror such as Edgar Allan Poe , H.P Lovecraft and Hitchcock.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
